items.title: Brian Walshe sentenced to life in prison for murdering and dismembering wife
items.description: A Norfolk County jury found Brian Walshe guilty of first-degree murder on Monday, after deliberating for approximately six hours.

items.title: WATCH:  A look back at the year 2025
items.description: From news stories to heartfelt moments and laughs, "Good Morning America" takes a look back at the year that was.

items.title: Inflation drops to lowest level in months, defying expectations of uptick
items.description: Prices climbed 2.7% in November compared to a year earlier.

items.title: US jobless claim applications fell by 13,000 last week as layoffs remain low
items.description: U.S. applications for unemployment benefits fell by 13,000 last week, remaining in the same historically healthy range of the past few years even as c...

items.title: WATCH:  World's 1st gene-edited baby takes 1st steps
items.description: KJ Muldoon received the first-of-its-kind gene therapy for a potentially fatal disease and is now marking major developmental milestones.
